Create a new API key for the current user

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"description":{"type":"string"},"expiresAt":{"type":"string"},"name":{"maxLength":50,"minLength":3,"type":"string"}},"required":["expiresAt","name"],"type":"object"}}},"description":"API key information","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Created API key with token","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"properties":{"apiKey":{"properties":{"createdAt":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"},"expiresAt":{"type":"string"},"id":{"type":"string"},"lastUsedAt":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"},"token":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
